channel.title: Barney in Blast Pit
channel.description: He repeatedly gets hit with the Tentacles and never dies. Thankfully for me him relentlessly shooting at them draws their attention away from me, but it did spoil that moment a little.

item.title: Barney in Blast Pit

item.description:
He repeatedly gets hit with the Tentacles and never dies. Thankfully for me him relentlessly shooting at them draws their attention away from me, but it did spoil that moment a little.
